label: AB3_oC16_63_c_3c-001
title: Mn$_{3}$As (D0$_{d}$) Structure
comments:
(Nowotny, 1951) set the structure of Mn$_{3}$As in space group $Pmmn$ \#59. This was repeated by (Villars, 1991) and (Brandes, 1992). However, (Carrillo-Cabrera, 1983) showed that the structure actually reduces to space group $Cmcm$ \#63, and this was recognized by (Parth\'{e}, 1993).  We follow that latter two works and assign the $D0_e$ structure to space group $Cmcm$. 
 (Carrillo-Cabrera, 1983) placed the structure in setting $Bmmb$ of space group \#63, but we have shifted it to the standard $Cmcm$ setting. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_oC16_63_c_3c-001}{Mn$_{3}$As ($D0_{d}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_oC16_63_c_3c-002}{NdTe$_{3}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB3\_oC16\_63\_c\_3c. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
